description: From international scientific vocabulary, from New Latin, from epizoon +‎ -ic = epi- +‎ zoic

definitionGroups.group: (biology, of a microorganism) Growing on the surface of an animal host, as:

entries.meaning: (usually) In a nonparasitic way, using an animal's skin as a microhabitat.
(less commonly) In a parasitic way, as an external parasite.
